source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_00<tab>Captain Doesrael, stationed at Oschon's Embrace, needs you to track down a guard who has abandoned his duties.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_00<tab>オシュオン大橋の衛兵隊長デュスレールは、橋の交通整理を投げだした衛兵の捜索を依頼したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_01<tab>With the recent increase in deliveries being sent between the Moraby Drydocks and Limsa Lominsa, passage across Oschon's Embrace has slowed to a crawl. Find Wyrstmaga, the guard whose duty it is to ensure smooth travel across the bridge.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_01<tab>オシュオン大橋が渋滞してしまっている。橋の交通整理を投げだした衛兵「ヴィルシュトマガ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_02<tab>Wyrstmaga appears intimidated by the angry shouts of the drivers as they fume at the seemingly interminable delays. Do your best to /soothe the irate coachmen so that the harried guard might return to his post and perform his duties in relative peace.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_02<tab>ヴィルシュトマガは、渋滞に憤る業者の剣幕に恐れをなしているようだ。衛兵ヴィルシュトマガが交通整理に戻れるように、橋の渋滞に「憤った御者」に、エモート「なだめる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_03<tab>You have managed to soothe the irate coachmen. Report your success to Wyrstmaga and have him return to his post.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_03<tab>憤った御者をなだめることができた。「ヴィルシュトマガ」に報告して、交通整理に戻ってもらおう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_04<tab>Wyrstmaga has returned to his post on the bridge. Report your progress to Captain Doesrael at Oschon's Embrace.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_04<tab>ヴィルシュトマガが、交通整理に戻ってくれた。「オシュオン大橋」の衛兵隊長「デュスレール」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_05<tab>The conflict preventing passage across Oschon's Embrace has been resolved. But with work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> demanding ever more materials, you can only wonder how Wyrstmaga will cope with the steadily increasing traffic on the bridge.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_SEQ_05<tab>オシュオン大橋の渋滞は、無事に解消された。しかし、造船の注文が増えているため、大橋の利用者はますます増えるだろう。ヴィルシュトマガが、また交通整理を投げださないことを願うばかりだ。
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_TODO_01<tab>憤った御者に「なだめる」をする

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_01<tab>Eh? Ye be wantin' to cross Oschon's Embrace? If ye ain't in a hurry to be some place, I'd rather ye hold off for a bell or two─presently, the bridge is such a right confusion o' wagons an' such, the damn thing's like to collapse.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_01<tab>オシュオン大橋を渡りたいのかい？
急いでなければ、少々待ってもらいたい。
現在、橋が落ちてしまいそうなほど、渋滞してるんでね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_02<tab>We expect a <var 1A 02 /var>bit<var 1A 01 /var> o' congestion, what with this bein' the only bridge connectin' the roads from the Drydocks to Limsa Lominsa, but today's traffic is somethin' awful.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_02<tab>ここは、リムサ・ロミンサ方面とモラビー造船廠方面を
つなぐ唯一の橋だから、荷車の往来はもともと多いが……
今日の混みっぷりはヒドイ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_03<tab>Speakin' o' which, what in the seven hells does Wyrstmaga think he's playin' at desertin' his post at a time like this? Do me a favor, would ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? Track down that skittish bugger an' tell him to get his arse back to directin' the chaos at the Embrace.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_03<tab>交通を整理している衛兵は、いったい何してるんだ……
すまんが、「ヴィルシュトマガ」という衛兵を探して、
混雑を早くなんとかしろ、と伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_11<tab>Bah, 'twas only a matter o' time before they sent someone after me, I suppose. Aye, I heard ye─the bridge is a bloody mess. Truth be told, I wish the damn thing <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> collapse and save me the sufferin'.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_11<tab>ちっ、見つかっちまったか。
俺……橋の交通整理なんて、正直もうイヤなんだよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_12<tab>I can't simply wave me hands an' have everythin' suddenly sort itself out, now can I? An' if I try reasonin' with those demon-spawned coachmen, I'm like to get me head bit off.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_12<tab>頑張ったところで、渋滞は減らないし
渋滞に巻き込まれた御者は、みんなカンカンで、
俺に八つ当たりしてくるし……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_13<tab>Listen, if yer not goin' to let me be, then can ye at least have a word with the more irate wagon drivers? Ye know, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> their tempers some? That'll be one less headache for me to deal with.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_13<tab>どうしても仕事に戻れって言うなら、
せめて、俺が交通整理しやすいように
渋滞に「憤った御者」たちを「なだめて」くれ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_OROGUARD_000_21<tab>Good sirs and ladies! Calm yourselves! There's no need to─oh gods...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_OROGUARD_000_21<tab>あわわわわ……！
落ち着いてください、落ち着いてください！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_21<tab>I got me a load o' goods from the Drydocks meant for Forgemaster H'naanza herself! Now yield the way afore I drive me wagon right over yer squealin' hide!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_21<tab>わしゃモラビー造船廠で作った部材を運んでんだ！！
リムサ・ロミンサでハ・ナンザさんが、お待ちなんでぃ！
そっちが道を譲るのが筋だろ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_21<tab>And my cargo's already late for the shipyard! If you want to be the one to explain to the Admiral why her <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> is behind schedule, then be my bloody guest!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_21<tab>こちとら、モラビー造船廠で使う大事な部材を預かってる！
メルウィブ提督が、船の建造をお急ぎなんだから
道を譲るべきは、そっちだろうが！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANS_000_21<tab>Blocked again!? They'll have the road backed up all the way to the gates at this rate. I swear by the Navigator, I'll kick those wagons over the sides my damn self if this bridge doesn't open up soon!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANS_000_21<tab>また渋滞かよ！？
後ろがつかえてんだから、早く進みやがれ！
ああ、邪魔な荷車を蹴散らしちまいたいね！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANN_000_21<tab><groan> This is the third time this week. I must have these fish across and properly stored before they begin to spoil!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANN_000_21<tab>はあぁ……やっぱり今週はツイてない。
この橋で渋滞につかまるのは、今週で3度目……。
積荷の魚が傷む前に、向こう岸へたどり着けるかな……？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_21<tab>Ye have a word with those irate coachmen an' <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> some tempers, an' I'll soon have the rest of this mess sorted out.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_21<tab>「憤る御者」を「なだめ」てくれさえすれば、
橋の渋滞なんて、あっという間に整理してやるさ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_31<tab>Well, I'll be damned. Ye actually managed to calm them buggers down!? Yer a miracle worker, an' that's the honest truth.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_31<tab>憤っている御者たちを、なだめてくれたって！？
そいつは助かった。あんた、なんていい人なんだ！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_32<tab>All I need is for the drivers to heed me directions without all that snappin' an' snarlin', ye see. Well, I'd best be at it afore they lose their tempers again.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_32<tab>御者たちが、俺の話を聞いてくれるんなら
橋の渋滞なんて、あっという間に解消してやるさ。
それじゃ俺は急ぐから、あばよっ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_33<tab>Oh, an' I'd appreciate it if ye could let Captain Doesrael know I'm back on the job.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_WYRSTMAGA_000_33<tab>おっとそうだ、俺が交通整理に戻ったと、
衛兵隊長「デュスレール」に報告しておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_OROGUARD_000_41<tab>Thank you kindly, adventurer! We should be able to get things moving again as soon as─ Hm? Now where did Wyrstmaga disappear to!?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_OROGUARD_000_41<tab>わわわ、ありがとうございます！
これで橋の交通整理は、なんとかなりそう……って、あれ！？
一緒に整理してたヴィルシュトマガがいない、どこ行った！？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_41<tab>Hmph. Ye could be right, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Maybe there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> room for both of us to squeeze past if I shift an ilm or two to the left. Probably could've seen that for meself if I hadn't been so busy screamin'. Heh heh.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_41<tab>確かに……
互いに、もう少し右端を歩けば、荷馬車がすれ違えるな。
頭に血が上って気づかなかった、君のおかげだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_41<tab>I'm sore glad at least one person on this bridge has <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> head on straight. Perhaps those useless guards should retire and let <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> assume their post.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_41<tab>あんた、お見事な采配だったな。
配達先のみんなにも、お前さんの活躍を聞かせておくよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANS_000_41<tab>Well done, mate, well done! Might've been a good show if it'd come to blows, but we all have places to be, now don't we?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANS_000_41<tab>おお、あんたやるねえ！
ケンカが始まらなくて、物足りないが
予定どおりに納品できそうだ、ありがとよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANN_000_41<tab><sigh> Now half my Drydocks shipment is spoiled thanks to this cursed bridge and its endless delays. If only I had spent more coin on chilling the fish...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_COACHMANN_000_41<tab>モラビー造船廠へ食材を運んでたんですが……
足止めのせいで、積んでいた魚の半分は傷んだでしょう。
もっと冷やしてくればよかった……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_41<tab>Wyrstmaga is back at his post, is he? Yer tongue must be made o' silver to have accomplished that feat!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_41<tab>ヴィルシュトマガが仕事に戻ったか。
本当に助かった、あなたのおかげだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_42<tab>He can't handle the yellin', you see. The gods only know how such a delicate flower survived guard trainin' in the first place.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_42<tab>あいつは、怒声を浴びると、すぐにへこんでしまうものでね。
まったく、この先が思いやられる……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_43<tab>An' he's never goin' to survive duty at the bridge now that work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> has a flood o' deliveries comin' in an' out every bloody day. Wyrstmaga better harden up, or start lookin' for a quieter line o' work.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_DOESRAEL_000_43<tab>造船廠には、船の建造依頼が次々と舞い込んでるそうで、
橋を使う輸送業者も渋滞も、ますます増えるだろう。
彼には、もっとしっかりしてもらわねば。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_31<tab>Make way, ye ugly bilge rat! I should've been in Limsa bells ago! Eh!? I'll calm down when fishbacks learn to fly! Now move yer arse!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_31<tab>ふん、そっちが道を譲りやがれ！
足止め喰らわなきゃ、今ごろリムサ・ロミンサについてんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_32<tab>Well, if ye put it like that, then maybe I'll hold me tongue for a bit.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANS_000_32<tab>……確かに、あんたの言うとおり、一度、冷静になると、
解決への道が開けそうだな。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_31<tab>You can take your self-important words and take a dive in the harbor! I have shipwrights expecting this cargo, and it'll be a cold day in Thanalan before I back down first!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_31<tab>俺は、誰がなんと言おうと進むぞ！
造船廠で、造船師が荷物を待ってんだ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_32<tab>Perhaps you do have a point. I shall endeavor to keep a hold on my temper, if only to see this situation resolved before the moon turns.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA110_00407_IRATECOACHMANN_000_32<tab>なるほど、あんたの言うことも一理あるな。
確かに、いったん冷静になったほうがよさそうだな。
